mapper.select: SELECT remark_id,remark_content,remark_type,remark_man,remark_date FROM am_remark WHERE emp_task_id = #{empTaskId} and remark_type = #{remarkType} and is_active = 1 order by created_time desc
mapper.update: update am_remark set is_active = 0 where remark_id = #{remarkId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.remark_content,b.remark_man,b.remark_date FROM am_emp_task a LEFT JOIN am_remark b on a.emp_task_id = b.emp_task_id WHERE a.emp_task_id = #{taskId} and b.remark_type = #{remarkType} and b.is_active = 1 order by b.created_time desc

SELECT f.remark_content,f.remark_man,f.remark_date from am_emp_task b LEFT JOIN am_resign r on b.emp_task_id = r.emp_task_id LEFT JOIN am_employment e on e.employment_id = r.employment_id LEFT JOIN am_remark f on e.emp_task_id = f.emp_task_id where b.task_category = '2' and b.task_id = #{taskId} and f.remark_type = 2 and f.is_active = 1 order by f.created_time desc
